item.title: About the ATACAMA Group
item.description: We are a group of students and posttdocs aiming to delve deeper into the methods and techniques used in applied research. Our group generally meets every two weeks. Because our focus is on foundational and widely applicable underlying techniques, all disciplines and backgrounds are welcome. This group schedules the time for discussing topics you don’t have time to learn and to expand your knowledge on what you don’t know. See more here
